isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - ADJUSTMENTS - WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: To check wiper pattern on the windshield turn wipers on to high speed, make sure wipers do not run off the glass or go below horizontal position to bottom edge of glass. To adjust wiper arm and blade assembly use the following procedure.

note.para: Water sprayed on windshield may help to determine wiper pattern.

svcproc.para:
Refer to Figure 114
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If driver or passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assemblies (Items 1 and 6) need adjustment to get the proper wiper pattern, lift wiper arm and blade assembly (Item 1) or (Item 6) off the wiper pivot post (Item 4) or (Item 9) by lifting windshield wiper arm lock lever (Item 5) or (Item 10) and lift wiper arm and blade assembly off wiper pivot post.

Position wiper arm and blade assembly (Item 1) or (Item 6) at the wiper pivot post (Item 4) or (Item 9) with wiper blade horizontal to bottom edge of windshield and lift windshield wiper arm lock lever (Item 5) or (Item 10) and push wiper arm and blade assembly down onto wiper pivot post, windshield wiper arm lock lever will lock wiper arm and blade assembly into place once it is pushed all the way down.
Turn wipers on to high speed and check for proper operation.
